languages.text: {n}На лице Драйвстема проступает холодная испарина. Он выдавливает покорную улыбку.{/n} "Это надолго приструнит знатные дома, Ваша Светлость, заставив их опасаться не только кощунственных слов, но и собственных теней".

traits.locale_text: {n}На лице Драйвстема проступает холодная испарина. Он выдавливает покорную улыбку. {/n} "Это надолго приструнит знатные дома, Ваша Светлость, заставив их опасаться не только лжеречия, но и собственной тени в вечерних сумерках".

languages.text: {n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."
languages.original_text: {n}На лице Драйвстема проступает холодная испарина. Он выдавливает покорную улыбку.{/n} "Это надолго приструнит знатные дома, Ваша Светлость, заставив их опасаться не только кощунственных слов, но и собственных теней".

traits.locale_text: {n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

{n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

{n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

{n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

{n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

languages.text: {n}El rostro de Drivestem emite un sudor frío, y fuerza una sonrisa de sumisión.{/n} «Esto pondrá firme a la nobleza en los años venideros, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Les enseñará a temer posibles blasfemias e incluso sus propias sombras».
languages.original_text: {n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

traits.locale_text: {n}El rostro de Drivestem emite un sudor frío, y fuerza una sonrisa de sumisión.{/n} «Esto pondrá firme a la nobleza en los años venideros, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Les enseñará a temer posibles blasfemias e incluso sus propias sombras».

languages.text: {n}ドライブステムの顔に冷や汗が浮かんだ。彼は無理やり笑みを浮かべた。 {/n}「これで貴族の家々は今後何年にもわたって列をなすことになるでしょう、陛下。そして冒涜的な言葉だけでなく、自分たちの影をも恐れさせることになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

traits.locale_text: {n}ドライブステムの顔に冷や汗が浮かんだ。彼は無理やり笑みを浮かべた。 {/n}「これで貴族の家々は今後何年にもわたって列をなすことになるでしょう、陛下。そして冒涜的な言葉だけでなく、自分たちの影をも恐れさせることになるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}德莱夫斯塔脸上流下了一股冷汗，他强颜欢笑道。{/n}“这样的举措，会让众多贵族在接下来很长一段时间内规规矩矩，大人。他们不仅会格外留意亵渎神明的话语，也同样会格外留意他们自己的影子。”
languages.original_text: {n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

traits.locale_text: {n}德莱夫斯塔脸上流下了一股冷汗，他强颜欢笑道。{/n}“这样的举措，会让众多贵族在接下来很长一段时间内规规矩矩，大人。他们不仅会格外留意亵渎神明的话语，也同样会格外留意他们自己的影子。”

languages.text: {n}Auf Drivestems Gesicht bricht kalter Schweiß aus. Er zwingt sich zu einem unterwürfigen Lächeln.{/n} "Das wird die adeligen Häuser über Jahre hinweg auf Kurs bringen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie werden nicht nur ihre blasphemischen Worte, sondern auch ihre eigenen Schatten fürchten."
languages.original_text: {n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf Drivestems Gesicht bricht kalter Schweiß aus. Er zwingt sich zu einem unterwürfigen Lächeln.{/n} "Das wird die adeligen Häuser über Jahre hinweg auf Kurs bringen, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Sie werden nicht nur ihre blasphemischen Worte, sondern auch ihre eigenen Schatten fürchten."

languages.text: {n}Le visage de Drivestem dégouline de gouttes de sueur froide. Il se force à sourire avec soumission.{/n} « Voilà qui mettra les maisons nobles au pas pour les années à venir, Votre Seigneurie. Ainsi, ils craindront non seulement les paroles blasphématoires, mais aussi leurs propres ombres. »
languages.original_text: {n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage de Drivestem dégouline de gouttes de sueur froide. Il se force à sourire avec soumission.{/n} « Voilà qui mettra les maisons nobles au pas pour les années à venir, Votre Seigneurie. Ainsi, ils craindront non seulement les paroles blasphématoires, mais aussi leurs propres ombres. »

languages.text: {n}Drivestem'in yüzünden soğuk terler dökülmeye başlıyor. Kendini itaatkâr bir gülümsemeye zorluyor.{/n} "Böylece ilerideki yıllarda soylu haneler hizaya gelecektir {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Yalnızca günahkâr sözlerden değil, kendi gölgelerinden bile korkar hâle geleceklerdir."
languages.original_text: {n}A cold sweat breaks out on Drivestem's face. He forces a subservient smile on his face.{/n} "This will bring the noble houses into line for years to come, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. It will make them fear not only blasphemous words, but also their own shadows."
